item.description:
Join us for a fun night playing board games, having some drinks, enjoying complimentary appetizers and socializing! We will have the private room at the Lansdowne Pub to ourselves. I will bring games, but feel free to bring your favorite board or card games with you. This will be a great night, so be sure to join us! Each guest is reponsible for the cost of their own food/drink.

There is no Sox home game on this night, so parking should be easy.

This is a joint event with Boston Cards & Conversation Meet Up group. Important Note: It is important that we have an accurate headcount, so if your plans change, be sure to update your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside the private room on the left. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.why: Join us for a fun and relaxing night playing board games in the private room at the Lansdowne Pub and enjoying free appetizers!
item.name: Board Games, Drinks, Free Apps at the Lansdowne Pub!
